document_data.name: Kossuth's Ire
document_data.mainbody: '''Kossuth's Ire''' was a long-dormant volcano located in the [[White Peaks]] mountain range in the [[Moonsea North]].{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|62}}

Geography.Geographical Features: After its most recent eruption, the area around Kossuth's Ire became a barren landscape that cracked open from overwhelming subterranean pressure.

document_data.History: After many years of inactivity, Kossuth's Ire erupted in the {{YearlinkName|1480}}, due to a "planar fissure" connected to the plane of [[Elemental Chaos]].{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|50}}{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|64}} Smoke, lava, and ash arose from its craterous opening, while its underground tunnels filled with magma.
document_data.Notable Locations: * [[Forharn]], a city of [[gnome]]s built within the darkest depths of the volcano.{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|79}}
